title: new​
content: since 1.0.0 </> LootTable.new() → LootTable Creates a new loot table.

title: Add​
content: since 1.0.0 </> LootTable:Add( rarityName: string, rarityWeight: number ) → () Adds a new rarity to the loot table with it's given rarity.

title: Remove​
content: since 1.0.0 </> LootTable:Remove(rarityName: string) → () Removes a rarity from the loot table along with it's weight.

title: Roll​
content: since 1.0.0 </> LootTable:Roll() → string Rolls the loot table, generating a random rarity.

title: Destroy​
content: since 1.0.0 </> LootTable:Destroy() → () Cleans up the metatable.
